item.title: New Features for the Finastra Portal
item.description: To keep its leadership role in providing the International customers with powerful tools to manage their transactions online in a one stop portal, Finastra' development team is preparing new features for the Finastra Portal.

item.title: Release of the Finastra Portal v5
item.description: In 2013, Finastra is officially delivering version 5.0 of the Finastra Portal.

item.title: Finastra and SWIFT Partner Solutions
item.description: Finastra is now a registered member of the SWIFT Partner Solutions community. See you next year at SIBOS for a complete presentation of our product line.

channel.title: News from Finastra
channel.description: Newsfeed from Finastra "E-nabling Your International Transactions"
